Package org.webcurator.ui.admin.validator

Class Summary
AgencyValidator Validates the Agency creation action, and checks all the fields used in creating an agency
ChangePasswordValidator Validates the save user password change action.
CreateRejReasonValidator Validates the Rejection Reason Creation action, and checks all the fields used in creating a rejection reason
CreateUserValidator Validates the User Creation action, and checks all the fields used in creating a user
RoleValidator Validates the Role Creation action, and checks all the fields used in creating a Role
TemplateValidator Validates the Template Creation action, and checks all the fields used in creating a Permission Template
TemplateValidatorHelper This class validates a template where all template variables can be checked and replaced Usage example: StringTemplate template = new StringTemplate( "To {contact_name}"); Map m = new HashMap(); m.put("contact_name" , "A, User"); String result = template.parse(m); // result will be "To A, User"
